assessment_item.data:
{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mcq","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMCQ"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

கீழே உள்ளவைகளில் எவை எலும்பு மஞ்ஞைக்கு பொருந்தாது?

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

செல் பெருக்கம்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1234"},{"text":"

லிம்போ சைட்டுகள் வேறுபடுத்துதல்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1235"},{"text":"

செல் தொடர்பு

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:1245"},{"text":"

ஆன்டிஜென் சார்ந்த எதிர் செயல்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1250"}],"questionCount":0,"media":[]},"config":{"metadata":{"max_score":1,"isShuffleOption":true,"isPartialScore":true,"templateType":"Horizontal","name":"7VIN35Q2 கீழே உள்ளவைகளில் எவை எலும்பு மஞ்ஞைக்கு பொருந்தாது?","title":"7VIN35Q2 கீழே உள்ளவைகளில் எவை எலும்பு மஞ்ஞைக்கு பொருந்தாது?","board":"State (Tamil Nadu)","medium":"Tamil","gradeLevel":["Class 11"],"subject":"Microbiology","qlevel":"MEDIUM","category":"MCQ"},"max_time":0,"max_score":1,"partial_scoring":true,"layout":"Horizontal","isShuffleOption":true,"questionCount":1},"media":[]}
